result.execSummary:
The defendant Tyrell C Fowler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Tyrell C Fowler is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Tyrell C Fowler was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Tyrell C Fowler was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Court reporter Teri Groves. Defendant Tyrell C Fowler in court.  Attorney Joseph Reback in court for Tyrell C Fowler.  Attorney Colleen Lennon in court for State of Wisconsin. Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 1 and 2.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

AMENDMENTS: 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count #4. 

On Motion of the State, the Court DRI Count #3.

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #1      
Court I/S a sentence of: 
-Serve 30 days in the DCJ, with Huber

-Stayed for 2 years probation cc to 2

COUNT #2      
Court I/S a sentence of: 
-Serve 30 days in the DCJ, with Huber, cs to count 1

-Stayed for 2 years probation cc to 1

CONDITIONS:
-No contact with Lecia C except only by electronic message or other written means and only for the purposes of arranging child custody or placement. 
-Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals 
-DNA on file
-Early termination after 18 months with agent approval
-Any other conditions DOC may impose

COURT COSTS:
Ct #1 and 2
-DA surcharge due on probation (not waived)
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due on probation

-Bond posted to be applied to restitution, remainder to fines/cc. Return any balance to poster. 
  
-Days credit if revoked: 13 days

DE advised of post-conviction rights

[Jaime D.]

Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts. Statement by victim.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.
